title: Terms of Service
intro: Welcome to 9anon AI. By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the 9anon AI platform, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: 9anon AI is an AI-powered legal assistant that provides general information about Moroccan law. Our services include:
items: Providing information about Moroccan legal procedures
Generating contract templates and legal documents
Referencing relevant legal sources and articles

disclaimer.title: 3. Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information provided by 9anon AI is for educational and informational purposes only and does not constitute professional legal advice. For specific legal advice, please consult a licensed attorney.
disclaimer.important: Important: 9anon AI assumes no liability for decisions made based on the information provided.

userObligations.title: 4. User Obligations
userObligations.content: As a user of our services, you agree to:
items: Not use the service for illegal purposes
Not attempt to misuse or hack the system

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, trademarks, and software related to 9anon AI are our property. Copying or distributing any content without prior written permission is prohibited.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy to learn how we collect and use your information.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any material changes. Your continued use of the service after modifications means you accept the new terms.

governing.title: 8. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by Moroccan law. Any disputes arising from the use of our services will be subject to the jurisdiction of Moroccan courts.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at:
